PrecisEnactment of the ORDER AMENDING CERTAIN REMISSION ORDERS MADE UNDER THE CUSTOMS TARIFF (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) to update the list of eligible claimants, increase the claim period and correct typographical errors in the following Orders: . 1. Tailored Collar Shirts Remission Order, 1997 2. Shirting Fabrics Remission Order, 1998; 3. Outerwear Apparel Remission Order, 1998; and 4. Blouses, Shirts and Co-ordinates Remission Order, 1998. .
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2001-0315 Publication Date: 2001-09-12
Attachments
precis:
Enactment of the ORDER AMENDING CERTAIN REMISSION ORDERS MADE UNDER THE
CUSTOMS TARIFF (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) to update the list of eligible
claimants, increase the claim period and correct typographical errors in
the following Orders:
.
1. Tailored Collar Shirts Remission Order, 1997
2. Shirting Fabrics Remission Order, 1998;
3. Outerwear Apparel Remission Order, 1998; and
4. Blouses, Shirts and Co-ordinates Remission Order, 1998.
.
